experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: •Rectified data by 90% while processed unstructured data to structured data with automation of a live tracker for chats,calls and emails•Created a weekly global dashboard for OYO Vacation Home-Beliville, DanCentre, Traum-Ferienwohnungen including its alerts automation•Extracted several data using SQL queries; merged, mapped, communicated and analyzed data for business insights and decision making•Gap analysis and requirement gathering with suggestive business development model changes for missing data, visualisation on Tableau•Compiled and analysed booking data of more than 20 Lakh+ base users for market segmentation and catalogued for target customer base

experience.title: Hall President
experience.description: •Part of Students' Senate, apex student body of IIT Kharagpur: institutional decision making for the welfare of 15,000+ students in campus•Spearheaded a team of 30 officebearers with 7 portfolios; strategically managed a 3-tier hall council handling the issues of 550+ boarders•Institute COVID-19 Protocol Committee: proactively monitored the recalling process of 8,000 students and provided emergency facilities•Administrated COVID-19 active cases reduction from 600 to 0, with quick decision making and execution abilities within the hall premises•Curated a budget of INR 16.5 Lakh for hall functioning and defended the same against General Body of the hall over various portfolios

experience.title: Journal Secretary
experience.description: Journal Secretary, Technology Students’ Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur, Social and Culture Committee, solely handled the publication and annualbudgeting of campus souvenir magazine, ALANKAR given to the graduating class of 2019 and online publication of the same for the class of 2020.o Worked with a team of 5 social and cultural secretaries to conduct over 10+ Open IIT competitions, General Championships, Inter Hall Eventscoordinating among 25 halls of residences witnessing participants of the whole Kharagpur community, including our esteemed professors andprofessionalizes of various genre, cultivating a cultural spirit among students to honor and polish their socio-cultural skills.o Elected to this post by 15000 students of IIT Kharagpur after a month long campaigning, sharp proposals and public meetings with 7 being thehighest oppositions to the post of secretary ever.o The first Secretary ever to start a new magazine (ILLUMINATION2019) in her tenure, which went on to be globally recognized across alumni.
experience.description_html: Journal Secretary, Technology Students’ Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur, Social and Culture Committee, solely handled the publication and annualbudgeting of campus souvenir magazine, ALANKAR given to the graduating class of 2019 and online publication of the same for the class of 2020.o Worked with a team of 5 social and cultural secretaries to conduct over 10+ Open IIT competitions, General Championships, Inter Hall Eventscoordinating among 25 halls of residences witnessing participants of the whole Kharagpur community, including our esteemed professors andprofessionalizes of various genre, cultivating a cultural spirit among students to honor and polish their socio-cultural skills.o Elected to this post by 15000 students of IIT Kharagpur after a month long campaigning, sharp proposals and public meetings with 7 being thehighest oppositions to the post of secretary ever.o The first Secretary ever to start a new magazine (ILLUMINATION2019) in her tenure, which went on to be globally recognized across alumni.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Delved into Web scaping of E-commerce websites, running data exploratory models on the price fluctuations and building insights on other featureselection of the existing commodity, running regression and classification, for insightful conclusiveness of the price and feature modelling scales.o Geospatial Data Handling of UBER database for the city of Bangalore Ward-2 for computing mean estimated time between destinations, comparingthe mean estimated time Google maps and attaining an accuracy of over 78% in the precision modelling and accuracy statistics
experience.description_html: Delved into Web scaping of E-commerce websites, running data exploratory models on the price fluctuations and building insights on other featureselection of the existing commodity, running regression and classification, for insightful conclusiveness of the price and feature modelling scales.o Geospatial Data Handling of UBER database for the city of Bangalore Ward-2 for computing mean estimated time between destinations, comparingthe mean estimated time Google maps and attaining an accuracy of over 78% in the precision modelling and accuracy statistics

experience.title: Data Consultant Intern
experience.description: Delved into rigorous price fluctuations research in over 50 major sectors shaking the Indian economy post Covid-19.o Data Collection from the Bombay Stock Exchange Sites of 50 Small Medium Enterprises running over data cleaning, exploratory data analysis,regression modelling and LSTM with time series modelling for conclusiveness of the major sectorial dependencies hit by the global pandemic.o A comprehensive detailed report making over 450 pages covering all the 50 major sectors shaking the economy with reasoning for the transition’s.o An article featured in News Sense media body.
experience.description_html: Delved into rigorous price fluctuations research in over 50 major sectors shaking the Indian economy post Covid-19.o Data Collection from the Bombay Stock Exchange Sites of 50 Small Medium Enterprises running over data cleaning, exploratory data analysis,regression modelling and LSTM with time series modelling for conclusiveness of the major sectorial dependencies hit by the global pandemic.o A comprehensive detailed report making over 450 pages covering all the 50 major sectors shaking the economy with reasoning for the transition’s.o An article featured in News Sense media body.
